name: Grata Monstrum
description:
A village is being plagued by monsters. You’re hired to help them with that, in one way or another.

GRATA MONSTRUM is a game about weird creatures and choices, both new and old. Do your job, find the monsters, and see what else you can learn in the process. 

Made for petricakegames for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2022.

CREDITS:

StormCat: Programming, Design, Sound

squazz: Art, Design

zephyreds: Writing, Design
